page.title: 13HOME LIFE IN TYSOE
page.content: {TYPICAL HOME LIFE SITUATIONS}:- 1. Mother, father, two children aged 5 and 3. One car family, one dog, computer, colour TV. Cooking by electricity, (no gas in village). Roast joint/poultry Sundays, homemade cakes, puddings and wines using garden veg and fruit from hedgerow. Mother reads to children weekdays, father at weekends. Favourite TV programmes, sports, comedy, and wildlife. Parents aware of safety and security needs, dangerous substances and medicine kept in locked cupboards or well out of reach. 2. 1 parent family, teenage children. Parent part-time employment, hopes to grow own veg, makes home made cakes. Watches little TV, learning to drive. 3. Retired couple, no TV, hobbies music, walking, cake decorating, self-sufficient in home produce.
